product_idea.title: Git Blame My Cat
product_idea.description: An ultra-soft black tee featuring a dramatic courtroom scene where a puzzled cat sits on the defendant stand. Underneath, in retro terminal green, it reads: 'git blame -c "Mr. Fluffypaws"'. The jury is made up of rubber ducks, and there's a pull-request gavel labeled 'merge conflict' hovering overhead.

mockup_data.caption: A funny t-shirt mockup generated automatically
